about_the_game:
R4YL is a thrilling infinite runner game that takes you on an action-packed adventure through mysterious and treacherous environments. In this fast-paced experience, players control a brave adventurer who must run, jump, slide, and dodge obstacles while collecting coins and gems to unlock new abilities and power-ups.

key Features


* Immersive Environments: Explore the Caves level with its eerie atmosphere, filled with beautifully detailed textures and realistic lighting effects. Future updates will introduce more levels, each with unique challenges and visual styles.
* Dynamic Gameplay: Experience the heart-pounding excitement of outrunning deadly traps and avoiding dangerous pitfalls, all while collecting valuable treasure and power-ups to enhance your abilities.
* Diverse Challenges: Test your skills with various obstacles and enemies that require quick thinking and reflexes to overcome. As you progress, the game's difficulty will increase, keeping you on your toes.
* Stunning Visual Effects: Dive into the world of RUN FOR YOUR LIFE with particle effects, motion blur, and atmospheric lighting that immerse you in the game's environment. Witness the power of Niagara particles in the torches and be captivated by dynamic post-processing volumes and volumetric fog.
* Customizable Settings: Tailor your gameplay experience with adjustable video and audio settings, including screen resolution, full screen or windowed mode, FPS limitations, and volume controls for music, SFX, and voice.
* Leaderboards and Achievements: Compete with friends and other players worldwide for the highest scores in distance covered, speed reached, coins collected, and gems collected. Unlock achievements and show off your prowess as you rise through the ranks.

Embark on a relentless quest in RUN FOR YOUR LIFE and push your limits as you conquer increasingly difficult challenges. Will you become the ultimate runner and claim your place among the legends? Join the adventure and find out today!

name: R4YL (Run for your life!)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: R4YL (RUN FOR YOUR LIFE!) is a thrilling infinite runner! Explore mysterious environments, dodge obstacles, and collect treasure as you push your limits. With stunning visuals, dynamic gameplay, and leaderboards, immerse yourself in this action-packed adventure. Will you become the ultimate runner?
